name: Twilight Ninja Jogen
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
[ Monster Effect ] You can reveal 1 "Ninjitsu Art" card in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.
pend_desc: If your "Ninja" monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.
monster_desc: You can reveal 1 "Ninjitsu Art" card in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.
